short_description: The upgraded CPAP hose brush cleaning kit is made of high-quality stainless steel with a soft, durable brush head. The CPAP hose brush protects the inner wall of the cleaning hose, preventing bending or clogging, making deep cleaning simple and reliable

The CPAP tube cleaning brush is suitable for 15mm and 19mm CPAP machine tubing and easily cleans the tubing. Additionally, a dedicated 19mm short brush is included for deep cleaning the mask and water tank

All CPAP cleaning brush heads are made with soft bristles, gentle enough to protect the inner walls of CPAP equipment from scratches. The bristle diameter is precisely designed to fit snugly against the inner walls of 15mm and 19mm tubing, while the dedicated mask brush easily reaches into every nook and cranny and connection point for effortless cleaning
The CPAP cleaning kit features a lightweight and compact design, making it easy to store and carry. Whether for daily home care or travel, it keeps your CPAP accessories clean and ready to go

We are committed to providing high-quality products that meet your needs and offer attentive after-sales support. If you encounter any questions during use, please feel free to contact us. We promise to provide you with professional answers and assistance within 24 hours

Care Touch CPAP Tube Cleaning Brush - Flexible Stainless (7 Feet) Plus Handy Brush (7 inches) fits 16mm Diameter Tubing
product_description: Care Touch CPAP Tube Cleaning Brush Plus Handy Brush For people sleeping or using a CPAP, BIPAP or any other PAP machines. It is important to constantly clean the machines and tubes to keep it sterile, germ and bacteria free. A person that sleeps approximately 6-8 hours a night, breaths on average 5,000 breaths a night which is over 2 million breaths a year. Now add on to that someone that is breathing through a mask and tube, especially one that humidifies the air, that is an absolute breeding ground for bacteria, germs and infection to live and grow. For this reason it is VERY IMPORTANT to clean the CPAP mask and tube on a constant basis. These Care Touch CPAP Cleaning Brushes make it easy to do so. The cleaning brush extends up to 7 feet so you can clean the entire length of the tube at once. The handy brush is great for the CPAP mask, to clean the opening where the tube gets inserted, without the 7 foot coil at the end. Check out our full line of quality CPAP supplies for your CPAP machine. Breathe easy, we've got you covered!

name: Cleaning Brush Set - Flexible Long and Short Brushes for Cleaning, Soft Bristles, for Tubes and Hard-to-Reach Places
short_description: BRUSHES FOR CLEANING: The 2-piece cleaning brush set helps you clean out the tube and equipment, ensuring all the crevices and tricky areas remain free from oils, residues, and bad odors

TARGETED CLEANING: Intricate designs and components can be difficult to clean which is why the cleaning brush set has been designed to reach all grooves and hard-to-reach places to effectively clean debris, oil, and residue from all surfaces

ENHANCED REMOVAL OF BUILDUP: Over time oils, dust, and other residue can accumulate on the surfaces within your hoses and other equipment, these brushes for cleaning feature soft bristles to help loosen the buildup without damaging the components

HOW TO USE: Gently scrub the accessories with the Brush using the correct soap and warm water, rinse the accessories thoroughly, and hang to dry; Keep the brush clean and store in a well-ventilated, dry area
WHAT'S INCLUDED: This set includes a long brush with bristles to reach into the tube and other hard-to-reach places, and a short brush with bristles for easy-to-reach areas

name: CPAP Hose Cleaner Brush Set, CPAP Hose Brush & Dual-Ended CPAP Tube Cleaning Brush for 15 mm Slim & 22 mm Hoses (78.7 in), 2 Detail Brushes for Mask Vent & Humidifier, Brushes Only
short_description: CPAP Cleaning Brush Set (3-Piece) — Includes CPAP hose cleaner brush (78.7 in) + 2 detail brushes for mask vents & humidifier corners.

CPAP Hose Brush for 15 mm & 22 mm Tubing — Dual-ended CPAP tube cleaning brush. Use the brush head that matches your hose size. Keep the hose as straight as possible. If snug, clean half from each end—don’t force.
Detail Brushes for Tight Spots — Reaches mask vents, elbows, ports, seals & humidifier corners. Soft nylon—gentle on silicone & plastic
Reinforced Core, Smooth Glide — Locked head connection helps resist loosening; PA66-coated 304 spring core reduces friction and snagging.
Routine Care Only — Use with mild soap + water, rinse thoroughly, and air-dry before storage. Mechanical cleaning aid only; not a disinfecting or sanitizing product.

name: CPAP Hose Brush Durable cpap Tube and Mask Cleaning Brush, 7-Foot CPAP Hose Cleaner for 19mm(Standard 22mm), 15mm Diameter Tubes, 7-Inch Handy CPAP Brush for Mask, Water Chamber (Light Blue)
short_description: EASY CLEANING METHOD：The key to the brush entering or exiting the pipe easily is that the section of the pipe in the direction of the brush's movement is straight.When the pipe is bent or knotted,the brush will have difficulty moving in or out.

CPAP TUBE CLEANING KIT：This is a 7-foot-long brush with one end measuring 15mm and the other end 19mm,designed to fit all types of CPAP tubing.It also includes a smaller brush(19mm) for cleaning the mask and water chambers, ensuring every nook and cranny is easily cleaned.
SOFT NYLON BRISTLES：Bristles soft enough not to damage equipment, but stiff enough to clean.The bristle diameter is the right size to fit snugly into the tubes and clean the interior.

STURDY&FLEXIBLE STAINLESS STEEL WIRE：Made from high-quality stainless steel,it is resistant to breaking and has just the right tension to smoothly navigate through the hose.It's the perfect length for the entire cpap hose, it reaches completely end to end and ensures a good through cleaning.
